isis.stitle: No Idle APU/HVAC System - MAINTENANCE - Draining Water From Sediment Bowl / Changing Fuel Filter

svcproc.title: Draining Water From Sediment Bowl / Changing Fuel Filter

figure.caption: Figure 22. Draining Water From Sediment Bowl/Changing Fuel Filter

svcproc.para: The fuel filter has been designed to trap water in the see-through fuel bowl. Periodically check bowl for presence of water.
To remove water/change fuel filter, proceed as follows:

item.para: Turn fuel valve on filter body to the horizontal "OFF" position.
Unscrew the fuel bowl retaining ring and remove the fuel bowl being careful not to spill any fuel.
Dispose of water in fuel bowl.
If fuel filter element is dirty or the running hours have reached the level in the routine maintenance schedule, remove the fuel filter element.
Install a new filter element if necessary. Make sure O-rings are properly re-installed.
Fill fuel bowl to approximately 2/3 before re-installing.
Install fuel bowl and tighten retaining ring.
Turn fuel valve to vertical "ON" position.
Run engine to check for fuel leaks. Repair if necessary.
